com.axelor.studio.service

Class ViewLoaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ViewLoaderService

  • public class ViewLoaderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service use to find default ViewEditor of type grid and form for a model or create new if not found.
    Author:
    axelor

      • loadMetaView

        public ViewEditor loadMetaView(ViewEditor editor)
        Load selected MetaView of ViewEditor. It create ViewPanel and ViewField records from MetaView.
        Parameters:
        editor - ViewEditor to update.
        Returns:
        Updated ViewEditor.

      • setToolbar

        Method create ViewButton for toolbar of ViewEditor from Buttons of toolbar of FormView.
        Parameters:

      • setPanel

        private void setPanel(java.util.Iterator<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> iterator,
            java.lang.String parentLevel,
            java.lang.Integer levelCounter,
            java.lang.Boolean isPanelTab)
        Create ViewPanel from AbstractWidget, with given parent level.
        Parameters:
        iterator - AbstractWidget iterator
        parentLevel - String of parent level
        levelCounter - Level counter for current panel.
        isPanelTab - Boolean to check if its PanelTab.

        Load fields from GridView selected in ViewEditor.
        Parameters:
        editor - ViewEditor to update.
        Returns:
        Updated ViewEditor

      • addFields

        private void addFields(java.lang.String model,
             java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> items)
        Create ViewField record from AbstractWidget list(Grid view fields) and add it ViewEditor.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to find correct MetaField for ViewField.
        items - List of AbstractWidgets.

      • getDefaultForm

        public ViewEditor getDefaultForm(MetaModel metaModel)
        Method search default ViewEditor of type form for a MetaModel with default form view name.
        Parameters:
        metaModel - MetaModel to find view for.
        Returns:
        Default viewEditor searched or newly created.

      • addDefaultPanel

        private ViewEditor addDefaultPanel(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        Add default panel in viewEditor with all custom fields of Model related with ViewEditor.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor to update for default panel.
        Returns:
        ViewEditor with updated default panel.

      • getDefaultGrid

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getDefaultPanelLevel

        private java.lang.String getDefaultPanelLevel(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        Get level for default panel to add in ViewEditor. Default panel will be last panel in case of extended view.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor to search for panels.
        Returns:
        Last panel level
